title: It All Comes Down to Georgia | Guest: Steve Deace | 11/11/20
description:
If Democrats really want unity, it must be around liberty. The race for control of the Senate comes down to two runoff elections in Georgia. Black Lives Matter Inc. explained what it expects in return for backing Biden. Biden may supply the world with coronavirus vaccines before America. Glenn gets real about election fraud evidence: We must let the system play out. The New York Times argued it’s “possible for a story to be factually accurate AND part of a misinformation campaign.” After a listener expresses his frustration with how conservative hosts are covering Biden’s "win," Glenn speaks personally about where he believes the nation really is. BlazeTV’s Steve Deace breaks down the legal options Trump still has.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
